String.string: Grab the biggest parts you can find!
The whole hides! Heh! Muhrak's going to love this.
Defeat the argon forces in Tragieron Hall and Agonal Hall. [You must select Labyrinth of Terror (Solo) from the {@LinkCreature:253#1501#Teleportal} to advance this quest.]
Bring the armored argon hides to Amarvand at the Furnace Approach.
